title: Ham Hock and Butter Bean Soup
ingredients: ['120g dried butter beans', '1kg ham hocks', '1 (5cm) piece fresh root ginger, sliced', '1 large tomato, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '2 fresh green chillies', '1 tablespoon tamarind soup base', '700ml water', 'salt to taste', '1 small bag fresh spinach']
